Package de.chojo.sadu.base

Class QueryFactory

java.lang.Object
de.chojo.sadu.base.DataHolder
de.chojo.sadu.base.QueryFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataSourceProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
SqlUpdater
public class QueryFactory
extends DataHolder
Base class which provides a factory for easy usage.

Can be used instead of a DataHolder

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    QueryFactory​(DataSourceProvider provider)

    Creates a QueryFactory based on the passed QueryFactory.

    • QueryFactory

      public QueryFactory​(QueryFactory factoryHolder)
      Creates a QueryFactory based on the passed QueryFactory.

      Configuration will be copied.

      Parameters:
      factoryHolder - parent factory holder

  • Method Details

    • builder

      public <T> QueryStage<T> builder​(Class<T> clazz)
      Create a new query builder with a defined return type. Use it for selects.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type if result as class
      Parameters:
      clazz - class of required return type. Doesn't matter if you want a list or single result.
      Returns:
      a new query builder in a QueryStage

    • builder

      public QueryStage<Void> builder()
      Create a new Query builder without a defined return type. Use it for updates.
      Returns:
      a new query builder in a QueryStage

    • config

      public AtomicReference<QueryBuilderConfig> config()
      Gets the underlying config.
      Returns:
      config reference
